title: Ayaz congratulates Pakistan cricket team on Multan test victory
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 19 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Sunday extended his heartfelt congratulations to the Pakistan cricket team on their remarkable victory against the West Indies in the Multan Test match.
In a congratulatory message, the Speaker lauded the team’s exceptional performance, stating that it demonstrated their determination and skill.
He expressed hope that the team would continue to deliver outstanding performances in future matches.
“Pakistan’s cricket team possesses the talent and capability to defeat any international side,” said Ayaz Sadiq, emphasizing the high level of skill and potential within the national squad.
He reaffirmed his confidence in the players’ abilities and expressed optimism about their continued success in future challenges, wishing them the best for upcoming fixtures.
